member.name: N:NRules
member.summary: Contains classes and interfaces that implement executable part of the rules engine.

member.name: N:NRules.Diagnostics
member.summary: Contains classes and interfaces to troubleshoot and monitor rules engine execution.

member.name: N:NRules.RuleModel
member.summary: Contains classes and interfaces that represent rules in the canonical model form.

member.name: N:NRules.RuleModel.Builders
member.summary: Contains classes and interfaces that allow building rules at runtime in the canonical model form.

member.name: N:NRules.Fluent
member.summary: Contains classes and interfaces to load internal DSL rules via reflection.

member.name: N:NRules.Fluent.Dsl
member.summary: Contains classes and interfaces that allow specifying rules using internal DSL in C#.
